titles.title: Oversight of Independent Review Commission Recommendations Act
Oversight of Independent Review Commission Recommendations Act

To direct the Secretary of Defense to report to Congress on the status of the implementation of certain recommendations of the Independent Review Commission on Sexual Assault in the Military, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Oversight of Independent Review Commission Recommendations Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to report on the status of the implementation of specified recommendations set forth in the July 2, 2021, report by the Independent Review Commission on Sexual Assault in the Military titled Hard Truths and the Duty to Change: Recommendations from the Independent Review Commission on Sexual Assault in the Military.
